item.title: [j22] Black Cat
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Cat

When Black Cat dies, target opponent discards a card at random.

item.title: [j22] Big Score
item.description:
Instant

As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.

Draw two cards and create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

item.title: [j22] Berg Strider
item.description:
Snow Creature — Giant Wizard

When Berg Strider enters the battlefield, tap target artifact or creature an opponent controls. If {S} was spent to cast this spell, that permanent doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. ({S} is mana from a snow source.)

item.title: [j22] Benalish Honor Guard
item.description:
Creature — Human Knight

Benalish Honor Guard gets +1/+0 for each legendary creature you control.

item.title: [j22] Battle Squadron
item.description:
Creature — Goblin

Flying

Battle Squadron's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.

item.title: [j22] Basri's Acolyte
item.description:
Creature — Cat Cleric

Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

When Basri's Acolyte enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures you control.

item.title: [j22] Barrin, Tolarian Archmage
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Wizard

When Barrin, Tolarian Archmage enters the battlefield, return up to one other target creature or planeswalker to its owner's hand.

At the beginning of your end step, if a permanent was put into your hand from the battlefield this turn, draw a card.

item.title: [j22] Barrage Ogre
item.description:
Creature — Ogre Warrior

{T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Barrage Ogre deals 2 damage to any target.

item.title: [j22] Banefire
item.description:
Sorcery

Banefire deals X damage to any target.

If X is 5 or more, this spell can't be countered and the damage can't be prevented.

item.title: [j22] Band Together
item.description:
Instant

Up to two target creatures you control each deal damage equal to their power to another target creature.

item.title: [j22] Baloth Woodcrasher
item.description:
Creature — Beast

Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Baloth Woodcrasher gets +4/+4 and gains trample until end of turn.

item.title: [j22] Bag of Holding
item.description:
Artifact

Whenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard.

{2}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

{4}, {T}, Sacrifice Bag of Holding: Return all cards exiled with Bag of Holding to their owner's hand.

item.title: [j22] Axgard Cavalry
item.description:
Creature — Dwarf Berserker

{T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.

item.title: [j22] Aviation Pioneer
item.description:
Creature — Human Artificer

When Aviation Pioneer enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.

item.title: [j22] Avenger of Zendikar
item.description:
Creature — Elemental

When Avenger of Zendikar enters the battlefield, create a 0/1 green Plant creature token for each land you control.

Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on each Plant creature you control.

item.title: [j22] Avalanche Caller
item.description:
Snow Creature — Human Wizard

{2}: Target snow land you control becomes a 4/4 Elemental creature with hexproof and haste until end of turn. It's still a land. (A creature with hexproof can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

item.title: [j22] Auramancer
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

When Auramancer enters the battlefield, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [j22] Augury Owl
item.description:
Creature — Bird

Flying

When Augury Owl enters the battlefield, scry 3. (Look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

item.title: [j22] Attended Healer
item.description:
Creature — Kor Cleric

Whenever you gain life for the first time each turn, create a 1/1 white Cat creature token.

{2}{W}: Another target Cleric gains lifelink until end of turn.

item.title: [j22] Assembly-Worker
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Assembly-Worker

{T}: Target Assembly-Worker creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

item.title: [j22] Ash Barrens
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

Basic landcycling {1} ({1}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

item.title: [j22] Artificer's Epiphany
item.description:
Instant

Draw two cards. If you control no artifacts, discard a card.

item.title: [j22] Arms Dealer
item.description:
Creature — Goblin Rogue

{1}{R}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Arms Dealer deals 4 damage to target creature.

item.title: [j22] Archon of Sun's Grace
item.description:
Creature — Archon

Flying, lifelink

Pegasus creatures you control have lifelink.

Constellation — Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, create a 2/2 white Pegasus creature token with flying.

item.title: [j22] Archon of Justice
item.description:
Creature — Archon

Flying

When Archon of Justice dies, exile target permanent.

item.title: [j22] Aradara Express
item.description:
Artifact — Vehicle

Menace

Crew 4 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

item.title: [j22] Aquatic Incursion
item.description:
Enchantment

When Aquatic Incursion enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 blue Merfolk creature tokens with hexproof. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

{3}{U}: Target Merfolk can't be blocked this turn.

item.title: [j22] Apothecary Geist
item.description:
Creature — Spirit

Flying

When Apothecary Geist enters the battlefield, if you control another Spirit, you gain 3 life.

item.title: [j22] Anointer of Valor
item.description:
Creature — Angel

Flying

Whenever a creature attacks, you may pay {3}. When you do, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.

item.title: [j22] Angel of Flight Alabaster
item.description:
Creature — Angel

Flying

At the beginning of your upkeep, return target Spirit card from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [j22] Angelic Protector
item.description:
Creature — Angel

Flying

Whenever Angelic Protector becomes the target of a spell or ability, Angelic Protector gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

item.title: [j22] Angelic Page
item.description:
Creature — Angel Spirit

Flying

{T}: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

item.title: [j22] Angelic Edict
item.description:
Sorcery

Exile target creature or enchantment.

item.title: [j22] Ancient Stirrings
item.description:
Sorcery

Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a colorless card from among them and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

item.title: [j22] Ancient Craving
item.description:
Sorcery

You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.

item.title: [j22] Anchor to the Aether
item.description:
Sorcery

Put target creature on top of its owner's library. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

item.title: [j22] Amoeboid Changeling
item.description:
Creature — Shapeshifter

Changeling (This card is every creature type.)

{T}: Target creature gains all creature types until end of turn.

{T}: Target creature loses all creature types until end of turn.

item.title: [j22] Alseid of Life's Bounty
item.description:
Enchantment Creature — Nymph

Lifelink

{1}, Sacrifice Alseid of Life's Bounty: Target creature or enchantment you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

item.title: [j22] Alley Strangler
item.description:
Creature — Aetherborn Rogue

Menace

item.title: [j22] Alchemist's Vial
item.description:
Artifact

When Alchemist's Vial enters the battlefield, draw a card.

{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Alchemist's Vial: Target creature can't attack or block this turn.

item.title: [j22] Aftershock
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy target artifact, creature, or land. Aftershock deals 3 damage to you.

item.title: [j22] Aether Spellbomb
item.description:
Artifact

{U}, Sacrifice Aether Spellbomb: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

{1}, Sacrifice Aether Spellbomb: Draw a card.

item.title: [j22] Aethershield Artificer
item.description:
Creature — Dwarf Artificer

At the beginning of combat on your turn, target artifact creature you control gets +2/+2 and gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

item.title: [j22] Aeronaut Tinkerer
item.description:
Creature — Human Artificer

Aeronaut Tinkerer has flying as long as you control an artifact. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

item.title: [j22] Aerial Modification
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature or Vehicle

As long as enchanted permanent is a Vehicle, it's a creature in addition to its other types.

Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying.

item.title: [j22] Adventurous Impulse
item.description:
Sorcery

Look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

item.title: [j22] Adventuring Gear
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, equipped creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [j22] Act on Impulse
item.description:
Sorcery

Exile the top three cards of your library. Until end of turn, you may play cards exiled this way. (If you cast a spell this way, you still pay its costs. You can play a land this way only if you have an available land play remaining.)

item.title: [j22] Acrobatic Maneuver
item.description:
Instant

Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

Draw a card.

item.title: [j22] Academy Journeymage
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control a Wizard.

When Academy Journeymage enters the battlefield, return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.
